name: Kronobit Networks Blockchain
description: Kronobit Networks Blockchain is an educative and cutting-edge blockchain platform that employs a Proof of Authority (PoA) protocol to deliver robust, scalable, and secure solutions for decentralized applications. As a Layer 1 EVM-compatible blockchain, Kronobit Networks Blockchain ensures seamless integration and interoperability with Ethereum-based projects, enabling developers to leverage familiar tools and frameworks.
